ygData.messageBody:

>Subject: Thermal cloak idea
>
>I had this idea while re-reading the instuctions as to make a Thermal Cloak.
>Maybe we need to combine a few objects (Like FireWater and Belt) to create
a new
>object (maybe "fuel belt" or something) to be used in the final construction
>(I.E. fuel belt, rods and tattered cloak)- The way it's phrased in the tome
>insinuates that. I'll try it tonight.
>
>Safe Journeys

Dunno what to say about the belts... its either a component problem like a
gnome tattered cloak isn't a patchwork cloak, or it could be another item
is needed in the formula like a needle or something, or its just flat out
broken. =(

I'm really peeved about it though, it was something I wanted to make as it
sounded kind of cool.

Rotgut
